goals.complete: Sieran and I tracked the Sanguinary Blade to the tomb of the dwarf Dagnar Stonepate, founder of the Stone Summit faction. We made our way past a series of traps only to find Steag Frostbeard and the Sons of Svanir. Frostbeard used the Sanguinary Blade to create a monster and escaped in the confusion. We decided to develop a method of containing the blade's power before we tackle Frostbeard again.
